The largest, most advanced

container terminal in the Philippines

World-class

port operation and management

Premier gateway

for international trade

Key facilitator

of economic growth

Manila International Container Terminal

is the Philippines' largest, busiest, and most advanced container terminal. ICTSI’s flagship operation is one of the largest non-transshipment ports in the world.

 

TRUE

Strategic Location

MICT offers unparalleled simultaneous access to regional export markets across Asia - home to the world's fastest-growing economies.

World-class Operations 

Achieving globally competitive operational efficiencies for fast and safe cargo movement, MICT leverages the most extensive terminal area, facilities, and equipment fleet in the Philippines.  

TRUE

24/7 Real-time Cargo Visibility

Leverage visibility over your cargo to make better business decisions. Download the ICTSI App. 

TRUE
